channel.title: Need help banding uids

item.title: Need help banding uids
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“dillingo, post:2, topic:285266”]It should be a bracket error. Try removing the first bracket, it should look like this.

int UID = inStream.readDWord(); if(UID <= 1) if(UID <= 43904281) { disconnected = true; System.out.println(playerName + " was KICKED because his uid!"); destruct(); }[/quote]
thanks man :D:D

Read full topic

item.title: Need help banding uids
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ive got this

int UID = inStream.readDWord(); if(UID <= 1) { if(UID <= 43904281) { disconnected = true; System.out.println(playerName + " was KICKED because his uid!"); destruct(); }
when i compile i get 100 ERRORS
if i remove if(UID <= 43904281) {
there are none errors so how can i do this ?
